attributes.action: Place a clause in Student loans stopping them from being used for anything else other then for educational needs and purposes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Student loans are given for investment, for education. They are not meant to spending down the local boozer.

There should be a clause in the application that you will not use your student loan for anything other then educational purposes.

I am not paying tax, to fund Student loans so it can be spent at the local pub or on alcopops at the local Tesco Express!

If they are used for this, they should have 5% added on when they have to repay.

And ALL student loans should have to be paid back.

Free education stops at 16 /17 /18

If you want to go to uni then pay for it yourself. Get a job at the local Tesco Express!!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
